# IZAKAYA-CLASS RESTAURANT SHUTTLE
[color=#a4885c]Ship Size:[/color] Medium
[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 4-8
[color=#a4885c]Power Gen Type:[/color] Uranium
[color=#a4885c]Expeditions:[/color] None
[color=#a4885c]IFF Console:[/color] None
"A medium-size, japanese-inspired restaurant/pub ship with a large dining area, and equally large kitchen."
"This restaurant shuttle seats up to 28 customers in the dining area, providing the shuttle the capability to seat people all over the sector at once."
"The kitchen has a main cooking area can be used by up to 2 chefs comfortably, a separate beverages area to be used by a bartender, a food storage to store ingredients, a freezer to butcher meats and store ingredients long-term, and a deep-frying area."
"The in-house botany has 5 hydrophonics tray and an animal pen, it is located near the kitchen for ease of transport"

# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the substation unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC units current Load (W).
## 1.2. S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit
- Check that the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generators units are anchored to the floor. - Check that the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generators units has fuel. For extended flights make sure that you have enough fuel stockpiled to sustain prolonged power generation during flight. - Check that the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generators units are set to HV output. - Set the Target Power for 28-30 [bold]kW[/bold]. - Start the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generators units.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check that the O2 canister is anchored to connector port. - Check that both N2 canister is anchored to connector port. - Check that the gas mixer is set to the correct mixing ratio (21% Oxygen, 79% Nitrogen). - Check that the gas mixer is set to 101kPa. - Ensure that the gas mixer is enabled.
## 2.2. Waste Loop
- Ensure that the waste loop pipes are all properly installed.
## 3. Other checks
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled.
